short_summary: Request for Proposal for NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support for Department of National Defence. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to view and access solicitations, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
full_summary:
**NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support Contract**
==============================================

**Tender Notice**
---------------

On May 17, 2024, Shared Services Canada (SSC) published a request for proposal (RFP) for NetApp Data Storage Maintenance and Support or equivalent for the Department of National Defence.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   Tender reference number: SSC-24-00026485:T
*   Solicitation number: BPM021401/26485
*   Tender closing date: June 6, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
*   Amendment date: May 30, 2024
*   Expected contract start and end dates: To be determined

**Scope and Specifications**
---------------------------

The contract is for the procurement of NetApp data storage maintenance and support services or equivalent for the Department of National Defence.

**Eligibility and Evaluation**
---------------------------

*   Bidders must be registered in the SSC P2P portal to participate in the tendering process.
*   A detailed evaluation criteria has not been specified.

**Contract Terms and Conditions**
-------------------------------

*   The contract will be awarded through a competitive process.
*   Trade agreements applicable to this tender include the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

*   Name: Javier Ventura
*   E-mail: [None]
*   Phone: 3435769329
*   Fax: 3435769329
*   Address: 180 Kent St, Ottawa, ON, K1P 1B6, Canada

**Technical Specification Documents**
--------------------------------------

The following documents can be downloaded from the SSC P2P portal:

*   Solicitation documents
*   Amendment 001
